titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the additional standard deduction for State and local real property taxes.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the additional standard deduction for State and local real property taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2011 the standard deduction for state and local real property taxes.
